projectCategory.description: All the Projects containing issues before SOC.
projectCategory.name: Pre-SOC

content.text: SA - Multiple login failures for the same user - O365
Activity that resembles attacker behavior has been observed in the network.
Detected Investigation in Different Time Zones:

fields.summary: Alert:: Gibraltar Solutions | Internal | Rapid7 | MEDIUM | SA - Multiple login failures for the same user - O365

content.text: The error code 50053 indicates that the account is locked due to an active lockout policy. Hence, closing the alert for now.

projectCategory.description: All the Projects containing issues before SOC.
projectCategory.name: Pre-SOC

content.text: SA - Multiple login failures for the same User - Workstation
Activity that resembles attacker behavior has been observed in the network.
Detected Investigation in Different Time Zones:

fields.summary: Alert:: Cyas Tech | First Alarm | Rapid7 | MEDIUM | SA - Multiple login failures for the same User - Workstation

content.text: After reviewing the logs, we observed that the user was attempting to authenticate to an account that does not exist in the specific DC. Therefore, we are closing the case for now
